title: Understanding Types of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, we often categorize analysis into two main types: qualitative and quantitative. Qualitative analysis identifies the components present, while quantitative analysis measures the amount of these components.

title: Focus on Measurement
text: Since the problem involves measuring the concentration of pollutants, think about which type of analysis focuses on measurement rather than identification.

title: Choosing the Correct Analysis Type
text: Which type of analysis is concerned with measuring the concentration of substances?
